newsitem.title: USA: US Plains cattle sell at $69, trade thin -feedlots.
newsitem.headline: US Plains cattle sell at $69, trade thin -feedlots.

text.p: U.S. Plains feedlot cattle sold at $69.00 per cwt in extremely light volume Thursday morning, generally steady with top prices paid earlier this week on active sales, feedlot sources said.
About 400 steers likely to grade select and choice sold in Kansas but the number was too small for an adequate market test, sources there said.
The Kansas sales brought week-to-date movement close to 91,000 head. The showlist was estimated near 90,000.
